messages.subject: Re: Looking for a collector...
messages.msgSnippet: Looking for a collector who has a particular Nambokucho-period tachi, mumei, attributed to Etchu Tametsugu, Juyo Token. In France, I believe. Give me a shout
messages.messageBody:
Looking for a collector who has a particular Nambokucho-period tachi,
mumei, attributed to Etchu Tametsugu, Juyo Token.
In France, I believe.

Give me a shout --
my intentions are honourable.

Les

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] IS HARRY WATSON STILL ON AIR???
messages.msgSnippet: Been planning it for most of this year but figured it would be a regional show. However the response has been more than expected. The Hooters comment, while
messages.messageBody:
Been planning it for most of this year but figured it would be a regional show. However the response has been more than expected. The Hooters comment, while meant to have a comedic affect, has drawn the most attention!


________________________________
From: Andres Pedraza <apedraza93@...>
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 5, 2012 12:23 PM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] IS HARRY WATSON STILL ON AIR???

You had me at Hooters... That said, way too little notice. I will try next
time around now that I know.

Best,

Andy

On Sun, Aug 5, 2012 at 11:25 AM, Bob Elder <toyama1_2000@...> wrote:

> **

> Orlando Fla. I used to promote shows 30 years ago. This one will be yearly
> and 6 months apart for the Tampa show. Bill Green , who is directing the
> Tampa show and I are working together to insure the success of both events.
> My show will always be 6 months away from Tampa/ Inexpensive tables and a
> nice hotel with suites for rooms. 1/2 mile form the Orlando Airport. Next
> to a Hooters Rest. Check out www.orlandojapaneseswordshow.com. I have
> tons of the general public coming in. Thanks for the time. Bob Elder
>

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] IS HARRY WATSON STILL ON AIR???
messages.msgSnippet: In case anyone is interested, I am hosting a sword show August 25th in Orlando Fla. I used to promote shows 30 years ago. This one will be yearly and 6 months
messages.messageBody:
In case anyone is interested, I am hosting a sword show August 25th in Orlando Fla. I used to promote shows 30 years ago. This one will be yearly and 6 months apart for the Tampa show. Bill Green , who is directing the Tampa show and I are working together to insure the success of both events. My show will always be 6 months away from Tampa/ Inexpensive tables and a nice hotel with suites for rooms. 1/2 mile form the Orlando Airport. Next to a Hooters Rest. Check out www.orlandojapaneseswordshow.com. I have tons of the general public coming in. Thanks for the time. Bob ElderÂ 

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: IS HARRY WATSON STILL ON AIR???
messages.msgSnippet: Current webpage is at http://pages.suddenlink.net/afuresearch/afu/ and there is an email link there too. Brian
messages.messageBody:
Current webpage is at http://pages.suddenlink.net/afuresearch/afu/ and there is an email link there too.

Brian

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] IS HARRY WATSON STILL ON AIR???
messages.msgSnippet: Barry, Some time back Harry lost the afuresearch.com domain for some reason. The last address I have for him is afu@suddenlink.net - though I suspect he might
messages.messageBody:
Barry,

Some time back Harry lost the afuresearch.com domain for some reason. The
last address I have for him is afu@... - though I suspect he
might well be somewhere enroute to San Francisco at the moment as the Token
Kai is this coming weekend.

Craig

messages.messageBody:
Dear All,

Is Harry Afu Watson still on air at afu@...?? I've sent him an email that bounced back as undeliverable.

Regards,
Barry Thomas.
